titles: XVIII sermons on the second chapter of the 2d Epistle to the Thessalonians containing the description, rise, growth, and fall of Antichrist : with divers cautions and arguments to establish Christians against the apostacy of the Church of Rome : very necessary for these times / by that late reverend and learned divine, Thomas Manton ...
author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
publisher: Printed by J.D. for J. Robinson ... and E. Aylmer ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
